A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Too long \, could have done with scenes that didn’t add anything removed. Didn’t warm to new characters \, too much time spent on island. Rebels being chased and can’t get away \, then they go to a Casino\, ride about on big goats and come back ? Leia flys around in a vacuum then bangs on the air lock ! But good battle scenes \, with Rey still great
